        <general>
          <identifier>

            <entry>cahi1:data_f878c08e883370e5f8378ae21c651446ffd32ea6</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Separation of salt and sand from rock salt</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Trennung des Salzes und des Sandes vom 
Felsensalz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Séparation de sel et du sable du sel de roche</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Separação do sal e da areia do sal da rocha</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Separazione di sale e della sabbia dal sale della
roccia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χωρισμός του άλατος και της άμμου από το άλας βράχου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Separación de la sal y de la arena de la sal de 
la roca</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is second of four illustrations showing the separation of salt and sand from rock salt. Here, the rock salt is stirred in hot water.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">experiment</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hot water</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">rock salt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sand</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">soluble</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">stirring</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses liegt an zweiter Stelle bei vier 
Abbildungen, welche die Trennung des Salzes und des Sandes vom 
Felsensalz zeigen. Hier wird das Felsensalz im Heißwasser 
gerührt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est en second lieu de quatre illustrations 
montrant la séparation du sel et du sable du sel de roche. Ici,
le sel de roche est remué en eau chaude.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Isto é em segundo de quatro ilustrações que 
mostram a separação do sal e da areia do sal da rocha. Aqui, o
sal da rocha é agitado na água quente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è in secondo luogo di quattro illustrazioni
che mostrano la separazione di sale e della sabbia dal sale della 
roccia. Qui, il sale della roccia è mescolato in acqua calda.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι δεύτερη τεσσάρων απεικονίσεων που 
εμφανίζουν το χωρισμό του άλατος και της άμμου από το άλας 
βράχου. Εδώ, το άλας βράχου ανακατώνεται στο καυτό ύδωρ.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esto está en segundo lugar de cuatro 
ilustraciones que muestran la separación de la sal y de la arena de 
la sal de la roca. Aquí, la sal de la roca se revuelve en agua 
caliente.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Experiment</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Heißwasser</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Felsensalz</string>
          </keyword>
